resources.string: Set a voice profile to enhance your listening experience
The voice quality settings will be used when the call is not on speakerphone or a bluetooth headset.

You do not have any favorite contact at this time.

Open phone to answer the call
Open the phone to place a call.
Please open the flip to continue the call
Outgoing calls are restricted by FDN.

Number \"%1$s\" already exists in Speed dial list.

The SIM PINs you typed do not match. Please try again.

Please turn on the radio before viewing these settings.
The device will auto answer calls when in handsfree mode
"Failed to retrieve and save current forwarding number settings. Do you want to switch to the new provider anyway?"
Operation requires SIM PIN2 to be entered
Operation requires SIM PIN2 to be entered
Data operation not allowed during voice call on a Class C GPRS device
Device has not yet registered to the network. Data operation not allowed
Unable to select network. Inactive SIM or mobile. Please contact your carrier
Recipient is not on FDN list
Your SIM card does not allow a connection to this network.
SIM card detected. Switching to Global mode...
Network has been switched to Global mode.
SIM card missing. Switching to CDMA mode...
Network has been switched to CDMA mode.
The SIM card cannot be found. Please insert a valid SIM card and try again.
No GSM/UMTS networks were found. Would you like to switch to the Global mode?
No CDMA networks were found. Would you like to switch to the Global mode?
Your network mode will be changed to manual. Registering on %1$s…
No Network found. Returning to automatic network mode
Connect to data services when roaming
Connect to data services when roaming
Data connectivity was lost because you left your home network with data roaming turned off.
Allow data roaming? You may incur significant roaming charges.
"Share your phone's internet connection over USB & Bluetooth"

"To connect with USB: 1.Plug your phone into your computer. 2.Choose your phone from the list of network services in your computer's network settings.
To connect over Bluetooth: 1.Pair your phone with your computer. 2.On your phone,tap Accept or enter the code displayed on your computer. 3.Connect your phone to computer."

"Ther is no valid tethering APN.
Please contact the customer service to update your tethering APN."
Set and get the smsc number
You are now using a wireless network outside your country and you will be charged additional fees for using data features. Please disable data roaming to avoid charges.
Automatically redial the call if the call fails to connect
Cannot add more than %1$d contacts to the fixed dialing contacts list
FDN is not supported on your SIM card!
Please reboot your phone to apply setting
There are no contacts on your SIM card.
The old PIN you typed is not correct. Please try again.
The PINs you entered do not match. Please try again.
Type a PIN that is 4 to 8 numbers.
The PIN you typed was incorrect
Password incorrect, SIM is locked. PIN unblock code2 requested.
The PIN unblock code2 you typed is not correct. Please try again.
The PIN2s you entered do not match. Please try again.
Type a PIN2 that is 4 to 8 numbers.
Type a PIN unblock code2 that is 8 numbers.
SIM is blocked on Pin unblocking code2. Please change PIN2 and retry!
SIM is locked. PIN unblock code2 requested.
No SIM card found. Please insert a SIM card into the phone.
No network is available. Only emergency calls are allowed.
SIM is invalid. Only emergency calls are allowed.
Call not sent, no valid number entered.
"Call not sent, '%1$s' is not an emergency number!"
Dial Fail! Only Emergency and OTA calls can be dialed!
Call not sent, please dial an emergency number!

"Your device is currently on an international network and roaming charges will apply for all usage. Current %1$s roaming rates for this country can be found by visiting %2$s or calling %3$s. Please note that some features of this device automatically send data without user input, and international data roaming charges are incurred unless you disable them. To disable these features go to Settings, Data manager, Data Delivery and then uncheck the box for Data Roaming. Simply reverse this process and check the Data Roaming box to enable these features in the future. Click Yes to continue, otherwise No to disable Data roaming."
Any data access while on a trip outside the USA may result in significantly higher charges.
Allow data access for this trip
Deny data access for this trip
Unable to change the SIM PIN2 due to incorrect PIN entry. Number of retry left %1$s
Cannot switch FDN due to incorrect PIN2 entry. Number of retries left: %1$s
Set the length of DTMF tones
You cannot make a call while the device is in airplane mode. Would you like to turn airplane mode off?

"A special call needs to be made to activate your phone service.
After pressing “Activate”, listen to the instructions provided to activate your phone."
Listen to the instructions to activate your phone. Stay on the line until you hear confirmation that your phone is activated.
Please wait while your phone is being programmed.
Your phone is now activated. It may take up to 15 minutes for service to start.

"Your phone did not activate. You may need to find an area with better coverage (near a window, or outside).
Try again or call customer service for more options."
A SIM card is needed to operate this phone. Please turn off your phone and remove the battery to insert your SIM card.
The selected action is not available while in an emergency call
Network with Limited Service found. Do you want to initiate a Network Search?
Ignore calls with a text message settings
Enable ignoring calls with a text message
View, add, remove or edit text messages
Select when the dialpad will automatically be shown
The number you entered cannot be saved because the format is incorrect.
"Calls are restricted. No outgoing calls are allowed."
Calls are restricted to only your contact list.
Assisted dialing is on. Would you like to turn this off?
Assisted dialing is off. Would you like to turn this on?
Resetting current country will delete the new added country. The current country will be set back to default (USA). Would you like to continue?

To assure that your phone works properly while you travel, please verify the country of your current location so the correct Country code can be applied. The current country can also be changed under Settings->Call settings-> Assisted dialing.

"Assisted dialing allows easy dialing of international calls while roaming in another country. First set 'Reference country' to your home location. You may also edit the Country code, International dialing digits (IDD) prefix, the National dialing digits (NDD) prefix, Area/city code, and the National number length."
Select to turn on or off
Country name already exists. Please enter new country name.
Assisted dialing setting is turned on
SIM PIN2 blocked, enter PIN unblocking code2 to unblock
Incorrect Pin Unblocking code 2: %1$s attempts remaining
Phone Activation not supported on this network.
Call forwarding function is not allowed while roaming
No over-the-air country information exists or is incorrect, please enter the international Prefix
Set default voicemail, visual voicemail or prompt to always choose
Set roaming voicemail, visual voicemail or prompt to always choose
Operation Barred - Fixed Dialing Numbers Only
Manage Internet calling (SIP) accounts and status
For all calls when data network is available
Always use to place Internet calls
You can use the Call Settings to change which Internet calling account to use by default when placing calls, by selecting a different account under Internet call settings
There are no Internet calling accounts on this phone. Add one now?
Account registration stopped because there is no Internet connection
Account registration stopped because there is no Wi-Fi connection
Account registration failed: (%s); will try later
Account registration failed: incorrect username or password
Account registration failed: please check the server name
This account is currently in use by the %s application
%s is required, cannot be left blank
Port number should be within 1000 and 65534
To place an Internet call, check your Internet connection first
You must be connected to a Wi-Fi network for Internet calls (use the Wireless & Network settings)

The %1$s is more like a computer than a phone, with many features, such as software updates, GPS ephemeris updates, weather forecasts, email, chat software, and many more, that will require data costs. In order to ensure that you get the most out of your phone, we recommend that you apply for a data package from your network service provider. On the Internet, there are some spam, it will cause the phone regularly wakes up affecting battery life. So if you do not need to use data services, you can disable data network through the phone settings, which can avoid unnecessary data traffic and also extend the standby time.
IP prefix has not been set. Do you want to make the call without IP prefix?
Download and install the apk now?
Intl Roam CallBack Prefix has not been set. Do you want to make the call without Intl Roam CallBack Prefix?
Tap to set Intl Roam CallBack prefix
Tap to set Intl Roam CallBack prefix (default:%s)
